prompt: Write a detailed Python class that implements binary search. Include error handling, type hints, and docstrings. Make sure the code follows best practices.
Compare and contrast generators and context managers. Discuss their similarities, differences, use cases, and when to choose one over the other.
Write a detailed Python class that implements recursive backtracking. Include error handling, type hints, and docstrings. Make sure the code follows best practices.
Write a Python function to calculate binary tree traversal.

Design and implement a complete Python module for depth-first search. The module should include: 1) A well-structured class hierarchy with base classes and derived classes, 2) Comprehensive error handling and validation, 3) Unit tests using pytest, 4) Complete docstrings and type hints, 5) Example usage demonstrating all major features. Follow PEP 8 style guidelines and best practices for production code.
Write a Python function to calculate hash table.

Design and implement a complete Python module for linked list reversal. The module should include: 1) A well-structured class hierarchy with base classes and derived classes, 2) Comprehensive error handling and validation, 3) Unit tests using pytest, 4) Complete docstrings and type hints, 5) Example usage demonstrating all major features. Follow PEP 8 style guidelines and best practices for production code.
Compare and contrast Docker containers and generators. Discuss their similarities, differences, use cases, and when to choose one over the other.
Write a Python function to calculate fibonacci numbers.
Write a detailed Python class that implements string matching. Include error handling, type hints, and docstrings. Make sure the code follows best practices.
